d: When an Extreme-Threat enemy's HP falls below 50%, it becomes invincible for 30s and summons reinforcements. Each defeated enemy grants all allied units 1 stack of 1% Damage Dealt Increase, stacking up to 50 times. Invincibility ends early once a set number of enemies are defeated.
tip: Takes effect from Classic Repertoire Act Ⅴ

d: Enemy units take 80% less damage, but each time they take damage, the damage reduction decreases by 1%.
tip: Takes effect when the Classic Repertoire Act Ⅲ challenge starts

d: Every 5 instances of damage dealt by any ally grant 1 stack of 12% ATK Increase, lasting 10 s and stacking up to 10 times.
tip: Takes effect when the Featured Repertoire Act Ⅱ challenge starts

d: When an Extreme-Threat enemy's HP falls below 50%, it becomes invincible for 30s and summons reinforcements. Each defeated enemy grants all allied units 1 stack of 1% Damage Dealt Increase, stacking up to 50 times. Invincibility ends early once a set number of enemies are defeated.
Enemy units take 80% less damage, but each time they take damage, the damage reduction decreases by 1%.
tip: Takes effect when the Featured Repertoire Act Ⅱ challenge starts

d: Enemy units take 80% less damage, but each time they take CRIT Damage, the damage reduction decreases by 2%.
tip: Takes effect when the Featured Repertoire Act Ⅱ challenge starts

d: Enemies take 80% less damage. This reduction diminishes by 2% each time they take damage from a ranged weapon.
tip: Takes effect when the Featured Repertoire Act Ⅱ challenge starts

d: Enemy units take 80% reduced damage. This reduction diminishes by 2% each time they take weapon damage.
tip: Takes effect when the Featured Repertoire Act Ⅱ challenge starts

d: Enemy units take 80% reduced damage. This reduction diminishes by 4% each time they take melee weapon damage.
tip: Takes effect when the Featured Repertoire Act Ⅱ challenge starts

d: Enemy units take 60% reduced damage. This reduction diminishes by 6% each time they take periodic damage.
tip: Takes effect when the Featured Repertoire Act Ⅱ challenge starts

n: Aegis Cadence: Gloom of the Undying
d: Enemies regenerate 30% of their Max Shield every 3 seconds. Regeneration pauses while any elemental bonus effect is active.
tip: Takes effect when the Featured Repertoire Act Ⅱ challenge starts

d: Every 5 instances of damage dealt by any ally grant 1 stack of 10% Skill Intensity Increase, lasting 15 s and stacking up to 10 times.
tip: Takes effect when the Featured Repertoire Act Ⅱ challenge starts

d: Increases all allies' Ranged Weapon DMG by 50%.
tip: Takes effect when the Featured Repertoire Act Ⅱ challenge starts

d: When any ally deals Weapon DMG, that hit's CRIT Chance increases by 20% per elemental bonus effect on the target, stacking up to 4 times.
tip: Takes effect when the Featured Repertoire Act Ⅱ challenge starts

d: For every 15 Sanity spent by all allies in total, grants 20% Skill Intensity Increase for 15s, stacking up to 5 times. At max stacks, grants immunity to Hitstun.
tip: Takes effect when the Featured Repertoire Act Ⅱ challenge starts

d: While a Primander is present, nearby enemies take 25% less damage.
tip: Takes effect when the Featured Repertoire Act Ⅱ challenge starts

d: Enemies take 50% less Melee Weapon DMG.
tip: Takes effect when the Featured Repertoire Act Ⅱ challenge starts

d: Allies lose 50% periodic damage and gain 50% Weapon DMG.
tip: Takes effect when the Featured Repertoire Act Ⅱ challenge starts

d: Allies lose 50% CRIT DMG. Skill DMG has a 100% chance to trigger an elemental bonus effect.
tip: Takes effect when the Featured Repertoire Act Ⅱ challenge starts

d: Damage taken by enemy units per hit is capped at 35% of their max HP.
tip: Takes effect when the Featured Repertoire Act Ⅱ challenge starts

n: Verdict Cadence: Ballad of Water & Light
d: Enemy units take 400% increased Hydro and Lumino damage. Damage taken from all other elements is reduced by 50%.

n: Verdict Cadence: Ballad of Water & Wind
d: Enemy units take 400% increased Hydro and Anemo damage. Damage taken from all other elements is reduced by 50%.

n: Verdict Cadence: Ballad of Fire & Wind
d: Enemy units take increased Pyro and Anemo Damage by 400%, and take reduced damage from other Attributes by 50%.

n: Verdict Cadence: Ballad of Wind & Shadow
d: Enemy units take increased Anemo and Umbro Damage by 400%, and take reduced damage from other Attributes by 50%.
Enemy units take 60.0% reduced damage. This reduction diminishes by 10% each time they take damage from a different ally to the previous one.
Allies gain 1 stack of +10% ATK Speed and +5% Skill Speed for 10s when healed by other allies, stacking up to 6 times. At max stacks, allies become immune to Hitstun.
Each 4% of max HP an ally loses grants 1 stack of +10% CRIT Chance for 12s, stacking up to 10 times.
Allies lose 50% Weapon DMG and gain 100% CRIT Damage.
When an ally's HP is above 80%, their Skill Intensity is increased by 100%, and they become immune to Hitstun.
Allies lose 100% CRIT Damage and gain 50% periodic damage.
After using a melee attack, allies gain 1 stack of +10% weapon damage for 10s, stacking up to 5 times. At max stacks, allies become immune to Hitstun.
Allies lose 12% DMG and gain 100% CRIT Chance.
